title: Building Our Football Tolerance
description:
Domonique and Charlie start off with a recap of MNF. Then, they talk Tom Brady's skill level, Tua being a game manager, Lamar Jackson needing more money, and Kyler Murray's performance before getting into a new segment called "Domonique's Defense Attorney". After that, Roses and Thorns makes its return with Ashley Foxworth.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
